Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Fun, Festive, Friendly bar (that is frequented by local Dutchies).  Happy hour is from 6-8 everyday 7 days a week. There is no food here FYI.

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: The decoration and music are purposely kitschy. The place can be very fun and people (customers and staff) are very friendly. Has usually an older crowd. Cocktails are great and the happy hour (every day from 18h to 20h) make the prices very attractive.

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Great place!  Good feel, live music that will impress you.

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Cozy place with a friendly bartender and great cocktails

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Beer was a bit warm and they serve a special edition of heineken tha as a different taste. but place is nice with friendly staff. we had a nice time there...

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Great views of Paris. I was concerned about taking photos through glass because there is always a reflection.  The rooftop has openings in the glass walls for photography.  Brilliant.

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: The beer here is very good - always fresh and tasty hard to find such well set beer in Amsterdam.

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Wonderful small bar with a very friendly and handsome staff. I will have to visit here more often in the future.

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: This place is fun for people who like kitschy music. Don't go there unless you are stoned or/and deaf 'course music sucks.

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Went to eat since food was shown in the pictures.  All we saw was older men and loud music.  Disappointed.

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: One of my favorite places in Amsterdam. Good music. Interesting people. Happy hour every Sunday.

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Great music, great atmosphere beautiful people just pure fun. Totally recommendable

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Really nice time and great cocktails! Fun workshop too!!

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Very nice bar, great atmosphere. Also when you are not gay.

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: We went inside the building arround 1 am, very strange people in and outside the Bar!

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Amazing, perfect location, good foods and nice People

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Great staff and happy hours every day!

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Nice place, lots of locals, always busy

Name: Montmartre
Review Text: Nice gay bar. Funny people
